Member Function Documentation

virtual void glr::gui::IGuiObject::addFunction ( const std::wstring &  name,
std::function< void()>  function 
)
pure virtual

Adds a lambda callback function to this IGuiObject. The function has the specified name, and it's signature is specified by the passed in std::function object.

Parameters
functionThe actual function to be called.

virtual void glr::gui::IGuiObject::addFunction ( const std::wstring &  name,
std::function< void(std::vector< boost::any >)>  function 
)
pure virtual

Adds a lambda callback function to this IGuiObject. The function has the specified name, and it's signature is specified by the passed in std::function object. The signature can also have an unspecified number of parameters, implemented as boost::any objects.

Parameters
functionThe actual function to be called.
